pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate PanViz visualisations from your pangenome // PanViz is a JavaScript based visualisation tool for functionaly annotated pangenomes. PanVizGenerator is a companion for PanViz that facilitates the necessary data preprocessing step necessary to create a working PanViz visualization. The output is fully self-contained so the recipient of the visualization does not need R or PanVizGenerator installed.
